Rainy_Day_Lewis: What nasty weather...#$e#If you need me, I'll be in here.$h
Rainy_Night_Lewis: I made soup for dinner. [199 218 219 727 730]#$e#I'm not as good a cook as Gus, but I hope you like it.$h
Indoor_Day_Lewis: Morning, dear...#$e#I'm barely awake myself. Here, let's hope this helps. [395]
Indoor_Night_Lewis: Today was a long day...#$e#Paperwork and such.$s#$e#Let's go to sleep soon, dear. I'm exhausted.
Outdoor_Lewis: Your day starts very early, doesn't it?#$e#I'm not used to waking up quite so early.$h
spring_Lewis: The whole town seems more lively in the spring. It's refreshing.$h
summer_Lewis: I don't much like the summer heat...#$e#But I have to put on a happy face for the town.$h
fall_Lewis: The town looks lovely in fall colors.
winter_Lewis: The snow is lovely, but it's hard to get around without snowshoes...
Rainy_Day_0: What nasty weather...#$e#If you need me, I'll be in here.$h
Rainy_Day_1: Here you go, dear. I made it just a little while ago. [395]
Rainy_Day_2: What's on your agenda today, dear?#$e#I don't want to go outside in this weather... Good thing I've got some work to do inside.
Rainy_Day_3: Hmm... what should we do for dinner tonight?
Rainy_Night_0: I made some soup for dinner. [199 218 219 727 730]#$e#I'm not the best cook, but I hope you like it.$h
Rainy_Night_1: The rain makes our home seem cozy, doesn't it, dear?$h#$e#Let's turn in for the night.$h
Rainy_Night_2: Make sure you change into something warm, dear. I don't want you to get sick.
Rainy_Night_3: Let's head to bed early tonight, okay?#$e#You look cold. I'll help warm you up.$h
Indoor_Day_0: Morning, dear...#$e#I'm barely awake myself. Here, let's hope this helps. [395]
Indoor_Day_1: Ah, good morning, honey.#$e#I have some work to do in here today.#$e#If you need anything, you know where I'll be.$h
Indoor_Day_2: I tried my hand at breakfast, dear. [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#Did it turn out alright? I'm not really a chef...
Indoor_Day_3: Did you sleep well, dear?#$e#I slept perfectly next to you.$h
Indoor_Night_0: Today was a long day...#$e#Paperwork and such.$s#$e#Let's go to sleep soon, dear. I'm exhausted.
Indoor_Night_1: I made some dinner. [205 199 224]#$e#What do you think? It turned out okay, don't you think?$h
Indoor_Night_2: You know, they never tell you beforehand, but being a mayor is ninety-five percent paperwork... I swear.$s#$e#Anyways... how was your day, honey?
Indoor_Night_3: The farm is such a relaxing place to be.#$e#I liked living in the center of town, don't get me wrong, but being out here is so peaceful.$h
Outdoor_0: It's a lovely day today, isn't it, dear?$h#$e#Days like this make work a little more pleasant.
Outdoor_1: Hi, dear. If you need me to do anything, just ask.#$e#I'll be thinking of you.
Outdoor_3: Your day starts quite early, doesn't it?#$e#I don't mind it, but I'm not used to waking up so early.$h
OneKid_0: I wonder if %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like you?#$e#Or maybe a mayor like me...$h
OneKid_1: I never thought I'd be a dad.#$e#It's a challenge, but a very welcome one indeed.$h
OneKid_2: Let's go on a family outing tomorrow, dear. Just you, me, and little %kid1.$h
TwoKids_0: I can't believe I let you talk me into two kids.$h#$e#I'm overjoyed.$h
TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 plenty of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
TwoKids_2: You're a wonderful father, @.$h^You're a wonderful mother, @.$h
Good_0: I've never felt this way about anyone before, @. You're amazing.$4
Good_1: You're looking extra handsome today, dear.$h^You're looking extra lovely today, dear.$h
Good_2: You work so hard for us both, honey. I appreciate it.
Good_3: I love you, dear. Don't forget that.
Good_4: I admit that I never thought I'd be married to the new farmer someday...#$e#Of course, I always thought you were very attractive...$4
Good_5: I was so nervous when I sent you the letter about the Mermaid's Pendant!#$e#Was it too strong of a hint...?$h
Neutral_0: The town sure was bustling when I was running errands the other day.#$e#I'm glad to see that.
Neutral_1: Sometimes I think that this town might be fine without a mayor.
Neutral_2: Hmm... I'm feeling peckish. I'll grab a snack and get back to work...
Bad_1: Just... leave me alone! I'm busy, too, for Yoba's sake!$5
Bad_2: I always thought I was too busy for a relationship...$s#$e#I guess I was right.$s
funLeave_Lewis: I've got some errands to run today.#$e#Oh, you know... Paperwork to drop off, letters to mail, shopkeepers to check in with.$h
funReturn_Lewis: Hello, dear. I'm glad to be back.$h
spring_1: Happy new year, honey!#$e#Here's to a great year together.$h
spring_12: Sometimes I wish I could participate in the egg hunt.#$e#I'm sure I'd be awful at it, anyway.$h
spring_23: Of course I know the dance! I'm the mayor... it's my job to know all the town's traditions!
summer_1: Phew... it's like it just got hot overnight.
summer_10: Sorry if I seem a little scrambled, dear...#$e#I'm preparing for the governor's visit tomorrow.
summer_27: The moon jellies will make their appearance tomorrow.#$e#I've seen it so many times, but it's still a lovely sight each year.
fall_1: Ah... it's finally cooling off.#$e#I love the fall. It's a great season for relaxing and eating good food.
fall_15: So much preparation goes into the fair each year.#$e#There are a lot of behind-the-scenes things that the average villager never sees.
fall_26: He doesn't really want anyone to know, but I'll let you in on a little secret...#$e#The Wizard has a pretty large part in tomorrow's festivities. He helps out every year.$h
winter_1: Oh, it snowed last night!#$e#How strange, I don't remember seeing any in the forecast...#$e#I guess winter's finally here.
winter_7: Will you enter the fishing content tomorrow, dear?#$e#You always do so well.
winter_24: I hope you have your gift prepared for tomorrow, honey.
winter_28: Ah, the year is finally coming to a close.#$e#Let's drink. [346]
spouseRoom_Lewis: #$c .5#I've got some paperwork to do today.#$e#I got a good start this morning before you woke up, but I'm nowhere near finished.
patio_Lewis: I'm glad I still have time to garden.$h
